data.name: Mozilla Addon Widescreen NEW design v.120
data.description: ▶ It's better for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! Seems, now at 2019.01, it's not possible to switch to the Old desktop view as before: Disable "classic view" of front-end #6334 ONLY for Waterfox and brother Firefox old school like Firefox ESR etc...: NEED and Work better with (for all the Dark color flavor): [UserStyles] Dark Mozilla Add-ons (AMO) by maxigaz [GitLab] Mozilla Add-ons Dark Theme by maxigaz ADD domain("addons-dev.allizom.org") to it for : https://addons-dev.allizom.org/en-GB/firefox/

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

data.name: CC98 Fonts Style
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("www.cc98.org") {
/* The font! */
#root,
.mainPageTitle1,
.mainPageTitle1 a,
.mainPageTitle2,
.mainPageTitle2 a,
.mainPageCountTitle,
.schoolNewsTitle a,
.recommendedReadingTitle,
.recommendedFunctionTitle a,
.recommendedReadingAbstract,
.mainPageListBoardName a,
.mainPageListTitle a,
.mainPageCountContent,
.topBarText a,
.topBarCC98 a,
.topBarUserName,
.topBarUserCenter-mainPage,
.topBarMessageDetails-mainPage a,
.user-center,
.boardName2,
.areaName,
.areaName a,
.boardInfo,
.topicInfo-info,
.substance,
.userMessageOpt,
.userMessage-userName,
.operation1,
.changeEditor,
.button,
.focus-board-area .focus-board,
.footerRow,
.footerRow a,
.reply .reply-floor-lz,
.reply .reply-floor,
.page-link,
textarea,
.hiddenImage,
.createTopicListName,
.createTopicTitle input,
.createTopic,
#search .searchBoxSelect {
	font-family: sans-serif !important;
	font-weight: normal;
}

.topBarText a,
.topBarCC98 a,
.mainPageTitle1,
.mainPageTitle2,
.mainPageTitle1 a,
.mainPageTitle2 a,
.recommendedFunctionTitle a {
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* 吐槽：无法理解为什么 98 站务组写了这么多极其细节化的 class，并且都强制他们的字体为微软雅黑 */
}

data.name: watchnebula.com | Dark Mode (videos only) | Nebula
data.description:
A dark mode for Nebula, but only on the page that plays the video.

Nebula is a streaming video platform built by and for independent creators. Sign up for Nebula at https://watchnebula.com/

Tags: Youtube, watchnebula, nebula streaming, curiositystream, dark theme, standard tv, standardtv

data.name: Google Beautified
data.description: A Beautiful & Minimal theme for Google Search. This theme makes Google search better because search Items are separated more creating white space and puts focus on each item. Also the colorings are much better and distinguishable for eye. Source code available on Github. Reach me on twitter @_pooya. PLEASE VISIT MY WEBSITE: 👉👉👉 POOYA.ML 👈👈👈

data.name: Flight Rising: Smaller Familiar on Dragon Profiles
data.description: Just a simple style that slightly decreases the size of the familiars on the dragon profiles. I saw quite a few requests for this there.
